welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yasica Arriba, a charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this vibrant destination has to offer. We hope your stay with us is filled with unforgettable experiences!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Union Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at La Union Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cibao International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Cibao International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
